	<script>
	    $(document).ready(function () {
	        nMclass();
	    })

        function nMclass() {
            $('input').each(function () {
                if ($(this).attr("id") != "ctl00_header1_txtSearch")
                    $(this).addClass('no-mouseflow');
            });

            $('textarea').each(function () {
                $(this).addClass('no-mouseflow');
            });

	        $('.RadInput').each(function () {
	            $(this).addClass('no-mouseflow');
	        });
	    }
	</script>

<script>
    //Stop Form Submission of Enter Key Press  ctl00_header1_txtSearch
    function stopRKey(e) {
        var $target = $(e.target);

        if (e.keyCode === 13) {
            e.preventDefault();
            return false;
        }
    }

    $(document).on('keypress', stopRKey);
</script>

</style><section class="homepage-hero">
<div class="inner"><h2>Be The Solution</h2>
<p>Change the world, one child at a time.</p>
<a href="/sponsorkids/">Sponsor Now!</a></div>
</section>

        <section class="five-things" id="_fblive">
<h2>Upcoming Facebook Live Events</h2>
<img src="/uploadedImages/NewCF/Homepage/icon-5things.png" alt="Upcoming Facebook Live Events" /><h3>CHECK BACK SOON</h3>
<p>We’ll have an updated Facebook live event for you soon — stay tuned, and stay connected on Facebook!</p>
<p><strong>NEXT EVENT: TBD</strong></p>
<a class="btn btn-learn-more" href="https://www.facebook.com/pg/ChildFundInternational/events/" target="new">Learn More</a></section>

        <!-- Video -->
        <section class="homepage-video">
<div class="inner"><a class="video-lightbox" data-lity="data-lity" href="https://www.facebook.com/ChildFundInternational/videos/10156195611989222/"><img src="/uploadedImages/NewCF/Homepage/03-12.jpg" alt="3-12-2018 - Women" title="3-12-2018 - Women" /></a><div class="copy"><h3>LEND A HAND WHERE IT MATTERS MOST</h3>
<p>Your donation will support areas with the most urgent need.</p>
<p>MAKE A DIFFERENCE TODAY.</p>
<a class="btn btn-learn-more" href="/give_now/">Donate Now</a></div>

        <!-- Social Media Roundup -->
        

        <!-- How Sponsorship Works -->
        <section class="how-sponsorship-works" id="_how-sponsorship-works">
<h2>How Sponsorship Works</h2>
<div class="step"><div class="inner"><img src="/uploadedImages/NewCF/Homepage/icon-howto01.png" alt="Step One" /><span class="step-number">1</span><h3>
CHOOSE A CHILD
</h3>
<p>Search for and select a child to sponsor and we’ll connect you. Learning that somebody faraway cares, your sponsored child will feel uplifted and you’ll be instantly bonded to an important new person in your life.</p>
<a class="btn btn-learn-more smooth-scroll-to-link" href="\sponsorkids\#sponsoring-info">Learn More</a></div>
</div>
<div class="step"><div class="inner"><img src="/uploadedImages/NewCF/Homepage/icon-howto02.png" alt="Step Two" /><span class="step-number">2</span><h3>
YOUR GIFT IS MULTIPLIED
</h3>
<p>ChildFund brings additional funds from other sources, multiplying the value of your gift. These resources, combined with the help of ChildFund staff, partners and the local community, ensure that the entire community can move forward without leaving any children behind.</p>
<a class="btn btn-learn-more" href="/about-us/how-we-work/">Learn More</a></div>
</div>
<div class="step"><div class="inner"><img src="/uploadedImages/NewCF/Homepage/icon-howto03.png" alt="Step Three" /><span class="step-number">3</span><h3>
STAY IN TOUCH
</h3>
<p>You’ll receive news of progress and letters from your sponsored child, keeping you connected to the improvements your gift has made possible and forming a bond between you and your child.</p>
<a class="btn btn-learn-more" href="/letter-writing-tips/">Learn More</a></div>
</div>
</section>

        <!-- Other Ways to Give -->
        <section class="ways-to-give">
<h2><span style="background: rgb(233, 233, 233);">Other Ways To Give</span></h2>
<div class="ways"><div class="way"><a href="/emergency/"><span class="way-icon"><img src="/uploadedFiles/NewCF/Homepage/icon-eresponse.svg" alt="Emergency Response" /></span><h3>Emergency Response</h3>
</a><p>Your gifts help us respond to emergencies with immediate to long-term support.</p>
</div>
<div class="way"><a href="/Greatest_Needs/"><span class="way-icon"><img src="/uploadedFiles/NewCF/Homepage/icon-cgn.svg" alt="Children's Greatest Needs" /></span><h3>Children's Greatest Needs</h3>
</a><p>ChildFund directs your support to the areas that benefit children most.</p>
</div>
<div class="way"><a href="/ecommerce/catalog.aspx"><span class="way-icon"><img src="/uploadedFiles/NewCF/Homepage/icon-giftcatalog.svg" alt="Real Gifts Catalog" /></span><h3>Real Gifts Catalog</h3>
</a><p>Every gift you choose from our catalog is wanted and needed – even life-changing.</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>
